entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: WSW 39 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
